verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shall you set <S%H6965><s%> up the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> therein <S%H8033><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and cover <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

And you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the table, <S%H7979><s%> and set in order <S%H6186><s%> the things that are to be set in order <S%H6187><s%> on it; and you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the candlestick, <S%H4501><s%> and light <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof.

And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for the incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therein. <S%H8033><s%>
And you shall set <S%H7760><s%> up the court <S%H2691><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, and hang <S%H5414><s%> up the hanging <S%H4539><s%> at the court <S%H2691><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is therein, and shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof: and it shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%> and it shall be an altar <S%H4196><s%> most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>
And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot, <S%H3653><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it.

And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

And you shall put <S%H3847><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> him, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him; that he may minister to me in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office.
And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and clothe <S%H3847><s%> them with coats: <S%H3801><s%>

And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> them, as you did anoint <S%H4886><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%> that they may minister to me in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office: for their anointing <S%H4888><s%> shall surely be an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> priesthood <S%H3550><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Moses: <S%H4872><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared <S%H6965><s%> up.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> reared <S%H6965><s%> up the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and fastened <S%H5414><s%> his sockets, <S%H134><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> up the boards <S%H7175><s%> thereof, and put <S%H5414><s%> in the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof, and reared <S%H6965><s%> up his pillars. <S%H5982><s%>

And he spread <S%H6566><s%> abroad <S%H6566><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> on it; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat above <S%H4605><s%> on the ark: <S%H727><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> up the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the covering, <S%H4539><s%> and covered <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony; <S%H5715><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the veil. <S%H6532><s%>
And he set <S%H6186><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> on it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> over <S%H5227><s%> against <S%H5227><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> southward. <S%H5045><s%>
And he lighted <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And he put <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil: <S%H6532><s%>
And he burnt <S%H6999><s%> sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon; <S%H5921><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And he set <S%H7760><s%> up the hanging <S%H4539><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> on it the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%>and the meat offering; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he set <S%H7760><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> with.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%> thereat:

When they went <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and when they came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> they washed; <S%H7364><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he reared <S%H6965><s%> up the court <S%H2691><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> up the hanging <S%H4539><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> So Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> the work. <S%H4399><s%>

Then a cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stayed <S%H7931><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken <S%H5927><s%> up from over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> onward in all <S%H3605><s%> their journeys: <S%H4550><s%>
But if <S%H518><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> were not taken <S%H5927><s%> up, then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not till <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was taken <S%H5927><s%> up.

For the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was on the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> was on it by night, <S%H3915><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> their journeys. <S%H4550><s%>
